title: Add SKU field to Add Product page

requirements.text: Add a visible, functional SKU input field to the Add Product form in AdminProductsPage. The SKU field should appear in the ProductForm component, be required, accept alphanumeric input, and its value must be submitted along with the other product fields when the form is saved.

quotes: lets build the sku feild in the add product page first

acceptanceCriteria: A labeled 'SKU' text input field is visible in the Add Product form on the AdminProductsPage.
The SKU field accepts alphanumeric characters.
The SKU value is included in the product data submitted when the form is saved.
The SKU field shows a validation error if left empty on form submission.
The SKU field is pre-populated when editing an existing product that has a SKU value.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Only add the SKU field to the frontend ProductForm â€” do not change backend schema or data model unless the field is already supported by the backend.
nonGoals: Fixing the admin permission denied error (separate task).
Adding SKU to the product listing or product detail pages.
Any backend schema migration related to SKU.
